synopsis: In this introspective episode of Pineapple Plant Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir delve into the emotional complexities of breakups, sharing personal experiences and insights. They explore the journey of healing, self-discovery, and the importance of seeking support while navigating the aftermath of a relationship.
quotes: To love means to let go.
It's easy to look back and say, 'I should have done this,' but we acted in the best way we could.
Healing means feeling whole by yourself.
Sometimes you just have to let yourself feel your feelings.
It's okay to talk about your issues, even if you're going through a tough time.
We don't just go to the doctor when we're really unhealthy; we go for checkups.
Every moment of joy is precious, especially when you realize you don't have someone to share it with.
You have to build a stronger foundation within yourself.
It's okay to feel like a burden; just remember, you're not alone.
The hardest part of being single is learning how to be happy with yourself.
